description: Housed in a beautiful historic building, this business, originally a wine bar (hence the name “enoteca”), gradually developed into a restaurant over the years. The menu focuses uniquely on fish, almost all of which comes from the Adriatic, showcased in traditional dishes enhanced with a creative twist.
creditCards: ['Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
